english: I have borne great poverty myself .
chinese: 我本人已经为极度的贫困所拖累。

english: The old man has been soured by poverty .
chinese: 那老人因贫困脾气都坏了。

english: Large numbers exist in perpetual poverty .
chinese: 大量的人长期生活在贫困之中。

english: She 's been poorly off since her husband died .
chinese: 她丈夫死后她一直是贫困的。

english: Their health had suffered from years of want .
chinese: 他们常年贫困影响了身体健康。
贫困造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The great singer ended his days in poverty .
chinese: 那位大歌唱家在贫困中度过残生。

english: He led a disordered life and died in poverty .
chinese: 他生活毫无规律，于贫困中死去。

english: Poverty in itself does not make men into a rabble .
chinese: 贫困自身并不能使人成为贱民。

english: He has rendered me great help in time of need .
chinese: 在我贫困时，他给了我不少的帮助。

english: She was left without a penny .
chinese: 她已到了贫困潦倒的地步。

english: He was fated to die in poverty .
The staggering problems of poverty remain unresolved .
chinese: 令人震惊的贫困问题仍未解决。

english: The depression brought intense poverty to the south .
chinese: 大萧条给南方带来了极大的贫困。

english: His grandfather was a stonecutter, and he was very poor .
chinese: 他的祖父是个石匠，很贫困。
